name: CengageTechcheck
0:
”Alexa, ask Cengage system status”
”Alexa, ask Cengage Techcheck status”
”Alexa, open Cengage for system status”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cengage
des: Use this skill to have Alexa tell you what the availability status of the Cengage digital courseware platforms are at that moment, or over the prior 24 hours. Leveraging our industry best online status'ing capability for users, TechCheck, Alexa now can give you a quick summary status in seconds when a computer or smartphone is not in reach!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
